name: Movement, Inc

quests.name: Advanced Hook Launchers
quests.description:
Looking to scale tall buildings? Perhaps as a combat tool for getting you closer to your enemies?
    Look no further than Advanced Hook Launchers. There are three types you can purchase: 
    The Web Launcher shoots a web that can safely hook walls or creatures. 
    The Spear Launcher doesn't connects to some walls, but if it hooks a creature it will damage them and let you pull them. 
    The Pudge Hook will drag you and the creature you hook towards each other.

quests.name: Unlock Movement, Inc
quests.description:
Want to make your own Hook Launchers? Your own Elevators? Then this is the price.
    It seems like a lot for some of these, but this is a package deal. You unlock a lot of different mods like this.
commandrewards: me HAS LEARNED LOST KNOWLEDGE - MOVEMENT, INC

description: Looking for movement tech, Traveler? Grappling hooks? Teleproters? Look no further! Movement, Inc specializes in tech that lets you move around.
